description: She was previously the owner of http://anidb.net/ch139542 [Hana] who at the time was a cat idol and internet influencer known by the name "Love Pipi" (らぶぴぴ Rabu Pipi). After a scandal erupted Hana decided to leave her and go into hiding. By pure chance they later reunited but Hana declined Youko`s proposal to go back to being an influencer. However, they were finally reconciled with each other. Ever since, Youko keeps visiting Hana at the Akaneko on holidays.
name: Youko
